timeline.message:
CB-9470 Apply Security Groups to all instancegroups in SDX.

This adds in allowing all instance groups to be assigned a security
group.  Before we operated on the notion of only having 2 instance
groups for LIGHT DUTY SDX, but with MEDIUM DUTY we have 3+
instance groups.

CB-9470 Apply Security Groups to all instancegroups in SDX.

This adds in allowing all instance groups to be assigned a security

instance groups.

timeline.bodyText: @doktoric What was the original intention of applying this only on the first node for a given instance type?
timeline.author: kmanamcheri
timeline.diffHunk:

         instanceGroups.stream()
                 .filter(ig -> ig.getType() == instanceGroupType)
-                .findFirst()

replies.bodyText: if was not the first node but the instancegroup where the type equals
replies.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry my bad. What was the original intention of applying this only on the first instancegroup. This assumes that there could be only one set of nodes for a given instancegroup, no?
replies.author: kmanamcheri
